text:
Dear son,
We can't forget our first year talk in CC about so many khyali pulaoğŸ˜… like tumhara branch change in cse and lot more.
After that unforgettable and memorable first year summer camp jisne tumhari wicket keeping ka puri campus ko apna fan bana diya ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… and fir tere pass ek bandi ko chai pilane ka paisa na hone ke karan breakup and you who is that bandiğŸ™â€â™€ï¸
Phir teri wo randi rone wale mails to professors aur finally Teri sledging jisne sabko ghayal kiya.
Abhi to ek saal aur h memory collect krne ko tab tk ke liye take care son.
P.S: Keep your g.f safe from As***h
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Aur achyut bhai tere naam ke charche to pure hall me thi phir mujhe bhi jigyasa hui ki is anokhe naam wala bnda se milu.
Milne ke baad pta chala ki tu to apna hi padosi nikla yar..
Teri wo che251 wali kaand to mai bhi nhi bhul skta jiski wajah se teri gaand phatti rhti thi..
Aur ha mere se cricket me compete krne ki kosis to tumne bahut ki but nakam rahe..
Aur ha wo epic tha bhai jo number tumne mujhe dilwaye the sachan seğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Aur jhonty rhodes aajkal kisko apni fielding se ghayal kar rhe ho..
Wo antaragni wala scene to yaad hi hoga us din mujhe pta chal gaya ki tu bhi bhut desperate hğŸ˜…
Waise to bahut lamhe saath bitaye but IITB Aavhan wala epic tha Kaise humlog pura dare sahme room me band the phir agle din himmat krke ghumne nikle phir bhi andar se dar lag hi rha tha.
Let's meet asap and make lots of memory  till then take care brother.
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Kya hi bolu tumhare bare me kahne ko to bahut kuch h lekin ek baat jrur bolunga bhai tumhari jo sense of humor thi wo gajab ki thi mai yahi sochta tha ki humare pass itna sense of humor kyu nhi h.
Finally good luck for you future endeavors and ha don't lose your sense of humor ğŸ˜‰
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Tujhe to ye yaad h ki tune out mujhe kitne baar kiya lekin tujhe ye bhi yaad hona chahiye ki tune mere six kitne khayeğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…
But kuch bhi bolo yar you are one of the great off spinner IITK has ever got.
Tumse jyada mai eagerly wait kar raha teri ball face krne ko
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Bhai mai jab se  tere girlfriend circle dekha hu tabse abhi tak depression me huğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… 
Bc itna fan following ki teri kuch bhi likhi hui post bhale hi meme na lage but tune pta nhi aisa kya jadu kiya h logo par ki posted by shobhit sachan dekhkar hi log flat ho jate h..
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Humare interaction to 2nd year se start hui jab mujhe jab apne department topper ka pta chalağŸ˜Š fir kya kab kaise itne ghul mil gye ki pta hi nhi chala.
Lekin yar kuch bhi kaho govind ki gaand maarne ka maja hi kuch tha.
Hum sirf govind ki lene ke liye night out maarte the aur phir hum sab tere par dependent ho jate the exam time.
Ha ek aur baat kahni  h tu bhi to national player h cricket kağŸ˜ŠğŸ˜Š
Wish ki jldi milte h college me.
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Vivek bro tum jitne sidhe dikhte the utne the nhi ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…
But ansh ka tumhe tuition dena kaise bhul paunga and you know ki konse topic pe wo tumhe gyan deta tha.
Itna mt padha kar bhai thoda enjoy bhi kar liya kro
author: Abhishek  Anand

text:
Me- Aur yogi bro khele,
Yogi- Ha chalte h
Me- Chal kitne siiix marega
Yogi-Bsdk teri to gaand marunga
Phir mai teri gaand maar leta tha duck par out karke.
Yaar saari yaade to kbhi nhi bhul payenge.
Aur wo H12PL jitne memory banwaye uski alag hi baat h.
Teri commentary ki to puri hall deewani thi.
Most chilled person I have ever met in IITK.
Chal jyada bolunga to tu aur phul jayega..
Aur ha unacademy se humare liye bhi agle saal job le aana..
author: Abhishek  Anand
